content: Bosses generally come in two forms: Yaoguai Chiefs, which are mostly akin to Minibosses, and are found throughout a region, and Yaoguai Kings, which are mostly found at the end of an area or region as a main boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Boss_List_and_Guides.md', within the main section titled 'Boss List and Guides', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Types'.
The content is as follows:
Bosses generally come in two forms: Yaoguai Chiefs, which are mostly akin to Minibosses, and are found throughout a region, and Yaoguai Kings, which are mostly found at the end of an area or region as a main boss.
